name: ToL&ToK
description:
Tower of London and Tower of Kuwait game;

This game was created to simulate the role of Tower of London and Tower of Kuweit executive function assessment tools to be used in the assessment of executive function in healthy Omanis aged 50 years and above.

It intends to evaluate the accuracy level in performing these assessment tools and to get the range of time needed to perform them.

By playing this game, we can obtain normative data to be used in the diagnosis of Alzheimer’s disease and other similar conditions.
